caption: Great pizza awesome pizza!
Wow. What a Pizza. Just perfect. The price is even better. Thank you....whenever i work in Bay Ridge. Lunch is at Bella Roma..
It was a friendly atmosphere,  we enjoyed the pizza , not to pricey
My go to for pizza. Best ingriedents crafted with care, the food is just amazing, will always order here!
good pizza
Decent place. Make sure you when you order a pie of pizza you tell them to make it fresh otherwise they will give you a old pie of pizza. This has happened twice to me.
Bella
Our waitress was so great! So nice, so funny, welcoming, and she was busy, we were not her only table, and she was awesome!
Ordered for takeout and it was done in sometime and tasted like your local pizzeria
There's just something about that sauce...!

One hiccup should have been a warning. They had made a mistake on one of my orders previously, granted it was a small mistake. We are only human, I let it slide. But today is the last day I order from here. While their food is good, I do not recommend ordering over the phone. Ordered 2 chicken parmigiana hero’s, and recieved 2 eggplant parmigiana heroes. When I called back to complain and send them back, the female that answered the phone refused and said that she will not send the correct order. I then asked for a refund which was denied as well. She only gave the phone to the manager/owner when I threatened to leave a review. Bad business. He refused to send another order (THE CORRECT ORDER) as well. I was left with 2 heroes that went in the trash, because we do not eat eggplant. My guess is that they probably ran out of chicken and gave us eggplant not wanting to lose a buck. Well you lost us now, thank you for showing your true character. $17.50 (cost of the heroes) in the trash, during the pandemic too, when ordering out is considered to be a treat for me. 2 stars for delivering the correct fries. Be grateful for that extra star.
Dirthy
I always come grabbing some food here. I loved the speedy customer service and well cooked food. Keep up the good work.
Great Sauce 👍🏼

Very well organised and convenient spot. They serve large portions and for reasonable rates. We enjoyed the food very much and the staff members were very attentive and chatty. I recommend this place.
Omg!! Lovely pizza and crispy.
Good pizza. Nice clean place to sit down and eat. Pleasant guys behind the counter.
Delicious pizza
GREAT CHEESE PIZZA AND GARLIC BREAD
Nice pizza. Good service. May be a little bit oily but still good and delicious.
Delicious pizza and the people are nice. Short wait for good pizza

Great pizzeria -Hands Down For Me- Offering a variety selection pasta dishes Pizzas, salads, and appetizers - deserts. Those jumbo garlic knots and tomato's sauce are a bulls eye on the spot no lies The tomatoes sauce is contagious having You going back for more and more. 🤭
Sauce was fresh and dough was crisp, chicken roll was excellent
I very liked this place but today I was trying to order and the guy ignored me for like 10 mins, there was no one in the store .
Awesome pizza!
Great pizza, pasta dishes, all around Those garlic knots are fabulous don't Forget the sauce.
Good pizza, very familiar, very ours.  bay ridge
Great taste and cheap prizes.

Me and my family try the pizza and chicken parm with penne vodka bolt excellent
had a slice there 3 weeks ago, meant to put up a nice review. thank you guys!

Am deeply disappointed today. I always loved eating there and picking it up there bringing it home, still pizza was perfect. But today I made it to be delivered, and for some reason pizza dough was burnt(I could even smell it when I opened the box) and it was also super chewy. I dunno what happened.. but I am sad cuz I was so excited. 😭😭
They offer a fantastic variety of fresh food. I love eating here. The employees are always nice, rates are convenient and the spot is always well organised.

Delicious abundant healthy food 😋
Good pizza but, mozzarella sticks were brittle and dry and overcooked could be because it was late at night and near closing time.
I think is one of the best pizza in Bay Ridge
I think is one of the best pizza in bayridge
Great pizza, kind people.
This is one of the best place i ever eat Pizza
Excellent pizza excellent chicken parmesan
The pizza is good and the dishes even better. And the staff are cool.

The 2 reviews that said the owner(s) were nasty or rude were probably in very bad mood themselves ,that day. My family has been eating there since it was bought from Del Corso. The guys could not be more accommodating.  Once, I saw them go outside to give food to someone in a wheelchair! My daughter and I love the eggplant parmesan. The main dish entrees (I've had the fish) were delicious, fresh and quite reasonable. We go there at least 3x a wk. The owners often offer us an extra soda and on occasion,  an extra slice. They always have a smile. We love it there!
Great pizza, good service,  reasonable prices.
Great Pizza
The owner became irate and yelled at me for my complaining about them getting my order wrong. Unbelievable I thought he was a nice person
The owner is soo nasty and rude
Best grandma’ & cheese pizza in Brooklyn!
Very courteous and polite staff, good pizza definitely recommend.
they are the best Italians i have ever met. so nice and welcoming and also. its the BEST FREAKING PIZZA I HAVE EVER TASTED IN MY LIFE I SWEAR. I FORCE EVERYONE TO AT FROM THERE.
Gino and Everyone at Bella Roma treat you like family and make the Best pizza and Italian food in Brooklyn !!!
Food is delicious and I loved the Sicilian slices. The service was quick and the staff made you feel at home. Great place with great people!
The pizza is very good! Very NY! The owners are nice and friendly to talk to. And it’s pretty inexpensive, $13 for a large pie if you pick it up. Not to mention it’s clean and new! 👍🏼👏🏼
10/10 best place for dat good pizzzzzzaaa pie

I LOVE this place. Would go here everyday. I have many pizzerias near me, but this is by far the best one. Food is always SO good and fresh. Nice atmosphere, always clean. Prices are great too. If you haven't tried this food yet,  you're missing out. 5 stars for sure.
Great variety of choices in the Menu, Food is great ,Place has a lot of space.Will come again.
Loved Lasagna and pizza with vodka sauce. Good job!
A great new place to eat pizza, great for the family!
Love the pizza here, very tasty. Glad to have these guys in our neighborhood.
Had a great dinner of chicken and broccoli rabe at Bella Roma. Food was excellent!  Thanks for everything!
Brand new place...fixed it up really nice inside and the food is amazing. Had a plain slice, white slice with broccoli, and the chicken parmesan entree. Really really excellent taste and quality.
